body_html: So the PR to fix the chain rule mention is #3650. As for the example, @harpone: do you want to personally fix it? It's a nontrivial amount of work for a marginal gain, since the goal of the tutorial is to teach people how to use the API, not to teach them calculus.
body_text: So the PR to fix the chain rule mention is #3650.  As for the example, @harpone: do you want to personally fix it?  It's a nontrivial amount of work for a marginal gain, since the goal of the tutorial is to teach people how to use the API, not to teach them calculus.
body: So the PR to fix the chain rule mention is https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/3650.  As for the example, @harpone: do you want to personally fix it?  It's a nontrivial amount of work for a marginal gain, since the goal of the tutorial is to teach people how to use the API, not to teach them calculus.
